board = biquskr_rrf_e3_1.1; 

//LED blinks to indicate Platform is spinning or other diagnostic 
//Comment out or set to NoPin if not wanted.
leds.diagnostic = PE.2; 


heat.tempSensePins = {bedtemp, e0temp}; //Max of 3 entries
//heat.spiTempSensorCSPins = { }; //Max of 2 entries

	//ESP Settings
8266wifi.espDataReadyPin = PA.6;
8266wifi.TfrReadyPin = PA.7;
8266wifi.espResetPin = PA.4;
	//ESP RX/TX Settings
8266wifi.serialRxTxPins = { PD.9, PD.8 } ;
serial.aux.rxTxPins = {NoPin, NoPin};
					//TMC Smart Drivers
stepper.numSmartDrivers = 4;

//sensorless homing

stepper.TmcDiagPins = {C.0, C.1} ;

//12864 display

lcd.encoderPinA=B.2
lcd.encoderPinB=E.7
lcd.encoderPinSw=E.9
lcd.lcdCSPin=B.1
lcd.spiChannel=4
SPI4.pins={E.10, NoPin, E.11}
lcd.lcdBeepPin = E.8
